column1: Uchi////I recently moved to Houston from Los Angeles
column2: and this is the BEST Japanese food I have had.  The fish was so fresh and flavorful.  Everything was insanely delicious.  Definitely go during the (very short) happy hour - really great prices.  We went with a big group
column3: and it was fun. Good environment.  The food is in small plates and comes out at random times
column4: so be prepared for that.  Good hot sake and the fruit dessert was REALLY good.  They had a lot of gluten-free options (and knew what gluten was)
column5: which I really appreciated.  I will definitely be back.
